text: Boy Krazy was a New York City-based pop music and dancing girl group between 1990 and 1993. In 1991 and again in 1993, they had brief fame under their hit song "That's What Love Can Do". The members were Ruth Ann Roberts, Kimberly Blake, Johnna Lee Cummings, Josselyne Jones and Renee Veneziale. Boy Krazy's other songs were "All You Have to Do (released in 1992) and "Good Times with the Bad Boys". The latter song was released in February 1992. It, however, peaked as high as only #59 under the United States' Billboard Hot 100 Charts. This song was the final release under Boy Krazy. title: Boy Krazy
